text: 1st Rifle Division may refer to: * 1st Siberian Rifle Division (Russian Empire) * 1st Rifle Division (Soviet Union) ** 1st Caucasian Rifle Division (Soviet Union) (1922–1931) ** 1st Kazan Rifle Division (1922–1936) ** 1st Rifle Division (1942) ** 1st Rifle Division NKVD (1941–1942) ** 1st Crimea Rifle Division (1941) * 1st Guards Rifle Division (1941–1942) * 1st Guards Rifle Division (1943–1945) ==See also== * 1st Division (disambiguation)
title: 1st Rifle Division
